materials.raw_text: Al: 12.5 g, Bi: 10 g, Ga: 7.5 g, Se: 40 g

sourcing.instructions: Al (Aluminum powder) - available from chemical supply houses or online suppliers. Bi (Bismuth powder) - can be sourced from specialty metal suppliers. Ga (Gallium) - obtainable from electronic component suppliers. Se (Selenium powder) - available from chemical supply companies.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 12.5 g of aluminum powder and place it in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 2. Add 10 g of bismuth powder to the bowl. 
 3. Introduce 7.5 g of gallium into the mixture. 
 4. Finally, add 40 g of selenium powder. 
 5. Use a spatula to mix the powders thoroughly until a homogenous mixture is achieved.

steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible.
